      • onCreate

        public void onCreate()
        创建LbsApplication
        1)获取上下文,赋值个CONTEXT
        2)获取屏幕分辨率
        3)初始化SuperMap环境
        4)初始化mPoint2d和LOCATIONACCUCRACY

        onCreate 在类中 android.app.Application
